parameter.name: contour_shade_dot_size
parameter.documentation: Size of dot in shading pattern

parameter.name: contour_shade_max_level_density
parameter.documentation: Dots/square centimetre in highest shading band

parameter.name: contour_shade_min_level_density
parameter.documentation: Dots/square centimetre in lowest shading band

parameter.name: contour_shade_angle
parameter.documentation: Angle of shading line to the horizontal in degrees in an anticlockwise direction
